class  HACD
 Provides an implementation of the Hierarchical Approximate Convex Decomposition (HACD) technique described in "A Simple and Efficient Approach for 3D Mesh Approximate Convex Decomposition" Game Programming Gems 8 - Chapter 2.8, p.202. A short version of the chapter was published in ICIP09 and is available at ftp://ftp.elet.polimi.it/users/Stefano.Tubaro/ICIP_USB_Proceedings_v2/pdfs/0003501.pdf. More...

IntersectRayTriangle(): intersect a ray with a 3D triangle Input: a ray R, and a triangle T Output: *I = intersection point (when it exists) 0 = disjoint (no intersect) 1 = intersect in unique point I1
